short.ar: قم بتحويل المستندات بسهولة باستخدام أداة تحويل المستندات المستندة إلى المتصفح الخاصة بنا.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Easily convert your documents with our browser-based Document Converter Tool.
short.de: Konvertieren Sie Ihre Dokumente ganz einfach mit unserem browserbasierten Document Converter Tool.
short.es: Convierta sus documentos fácilmente con nuestra herramienta de conversión de documentos basada en navegador.
short.fr: Convertissez facilement vos documents avec notre outil de conversion de documents basé sur le navigateur.
short.hi: हमारे ब्राउज़र-आधारित दस्तावेज़ कन्वर्टर टूल के साथ आपके दस्तावेज़ों को आसानी से परिवर्तित करें।
short.id: Mudah mengonversi dokumen Anda dengan Alat Pengonversi Dokumen berbasis browser kami.
short.it: Converti facilmente i tuoi documenti con il nostro strumento di conversione documenti basato su browser.
short.pt_PT: Converta facilmente os seus documentos com a nossa Ferramenta de Conversão de Documentos baseada em navegador.
short.ru: Легко преобразуйте свои документы с помощью нашего инструмента для преобразования документов, работающего в браузере.
short.vi: Dễ dàng chuyển đổi tài liệu của bạn với Công cụ chuyển đổi tài liệu dựa trên trình duyệt của chúng tôi.
short.zh_CN: 使用我们的基于浏览器的文档转换工具，轻松转换您的文件。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control over your files with the Document Converter Tool! This versatile and user-friendly extension enables you to convert various file formats directly from your browser.

Key features include:

PDF Converter: Simplify your work by converting your files to the universally accepted PDF format.
DOC and DOCX Converter: Switch between the classic DOC and the modern DOCX formats with ease.
DOCM Converter: Preserve your macros by converting documents to DOCM format.
RTF Converter: Maintain text style and formatting with the Rich Text Format (RTF) converter.
TXT Converter: Strip away all formatting for a bare-bones text file.
DOT and DOTX Converter: Convert your document templates to DOT or DOTX as needed.
DOX Converter: Ensure compatibility with older versions of Word using the DOX converter.
PAGES Converter: Bring your Apple Pages documents into other formats for broader compatibility.

With just one click, you can convert from one format to another, saving time and increasing productivity. Whether you are a student, a professional, or anyone in need of quick file conversion, the Document Converter Tool is perfect for you.
